SCTX:
Begin hlormarScript

short followOn
short greetonce
short nolore

if ( GetJournalIndex "MV_AbusedHealer" >= 80 )
	return
endif

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	return
	;don't run time in Menu Mode. Very bad.
endif

If ( GetCurrentAIPackage == 3 )
	set followOn to 1
endif

if ( GetCurrentAIPackage != 3 )
	set followOn to 0
endif

if ( greetonce == 0 )
	if ( Player->GetItemCount "cloudcleaver_unique" > 0 )
		if ( GetDistance Player <= 512 )
			ForceGreeting
			;set greetonce to -1
		endif
	endif
endif
